mean_cn: n. 复印机（等于copying machine），抄写员，模仿者
mean_en: a machine that makes paper copies of printed pages, pictures, etc.
word_etyma: cop=copy复制+ier名词后缀 → 复印机
short_phrase: copy a sheet of paper with a copier
sentence: I bought this little copier for my home office to copy letters people send me.
sentence_trans: 我为家庭办公室买了这个小型复印机，复印别人发给我的信件。
